issue.title: [Rust][Datafusion] Implement nullif() function for DataFusion
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10330](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10330). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Here is the common definition of NULLIF() function:

<https://www.w3schools.com/sql/func_sqlserver_nullif.asp>

 

Among other uses, it is used to protect denominators from divide by 0 errors.

We have implemented it at UrbanLogiq and would like to contribute this back.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10330?focusedCommentId=17215738) by Jorge Leitão (jorgecarleitao):*
Good idea. (y)

I moved this to 3.0.0 to not block the 2.0.0 release.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10330?focusedCommentId=17239839) by Neville Dipale (nevi_me):*
Issue resolved by pull request 8688
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/8688>
